title: Oratio Introductoria De Musica Colenda
creator: Heinzelmann, Johann  Klingenberg, Martin
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Heinzelmann, Johann  Klingenberg, Martin: Oratio Introductoria De Musica Colenda  Recitata a M. Joh. Heinzelmano, Gymn. Berl. Rect. Sub Inaugurationem Clarißimi in sua hac aliisq[ue] artibus, Doctissimique Dn. Martini Klingenbergii, Münchenbergensis Marchici, hactenus Strausbergae Cantoris ... iam vocati legitime Cantoris Mariani Berlinensis, Anno M.DC.LVII. Illustr. Gratiae. Feria II. Passionalis hebdomadae. [Berlin]  Berlin 1657
